characters.name: Breezette
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord card #65 F. Has a similar color scheme to Liza Doolots, 'Julia', and FIENDship is Magic 03 Unnamed Filly - Julia. Voiced by Cathy Weseluck. Wears a mushroom.

characters.name: Cloudia Breezie
characters.description: The first of three Breezies featured in mystery pack wave 11. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to collector card descriptions, she and all her friends love "to visit" Ponyville.

characters.name: Lilac Breezie
characters.description: The third of three Breezies featured in mystery pack wave 11. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to collector card descriptions, she and all her friends love "to visit" Ponyville.

characters.name: Random Breezie
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: Sea Breezie
characters.description: A Breezie featured in a Rainbow Power and Cutie Mark Magic pack with Fluttershy. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to various descriptions, she and Fluttershy are friends and "unlock the magic of friendship" together.

characters.name: Seabreeze
characters.description: Seabreeze is a male andÂ particularly outspoken Breezie who appears in the episode It Ain't Easy Being Breezies, in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, and in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2.

characters.name: Sunny Breezie
characters.description: The second of three Breezies featured in mystery pack wave 11. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to collector card descriptions, she and all her friends love "to visit" Ponyville.

characters.name: Sunset Breezie
characters.description: A Breezie featured in a Rainbow Power and Cutie Mark Magic pack with Princess Twilight Sparkle. Shares her design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1, S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2. According to various descriptions, she and Princess Twilight Sparkle are friends and "unlock the magic of friendship" together.

characters.name: Twirly
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, during The Magic of Friendship Grows in The Last Problem, on the season 4 poster, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord cards #65 F and #168 C. Has a similar color scheme to Lemony Gem, "Tennis Match", and "Brawly Beats". Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: Windfall
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Voiced by Andrea Libman.

characters.name: Applejack
characters.description: Applejack is a female Earth pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She lives and works at Sweet Apple Acres with her grandmother Granny Smith, her older brother Big McIntosh, her younger sister Apple Bloom, and her dog Winona. She represents the element of honesty.

characters.name: Fluttershy
characters.description: Fluttershy is a female Pegasus pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She lives in a small cottage near the Everfree Forest and takes care of animals, the most prominent of her charges being Angel the bunny. She represents the element of kindness.

characters.name: Pinkie Pie
characters.description: Pinkie Pie, full name Pinkamena Diane Pie, is a female Earth pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is an energetic and sociable baker at Sugarcube Corner, where she lives on the second floor with her toothless pet alligator Gummy, and she represents the element of laughter. Pinkie writes and performs many songs, and she is the source of many of the show's comical and cartoonish gags. She is called Ponka Po in some merchandise.

characters.name: Rainbow Dash
characters.description: Rainbow Dash is a female Pegasus pony and one of the main characters in My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She maintains the weather and clears the skies in Ponyville. As a huge fan of the Wonderbolts, she becomes a reservist member of the elite flying group in Testing Testing 1, 2, 3 and a full member in Newbie Dash. In Sonic Rainboom, Rarity and Princess Celestia both declare that she is the best flier in all of Equestria. Rainbow Dash has a pet tortoise named Tank, whom she chooses out of Fluttershy's offered animals in the episode May the Best Pet Win! She represents the element of loyalty.

characters.name: Rarity
characters.description: Rarity is a female unicorn pony and one of the main characters of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is Sweetie Belle's older sister and the subject of Spike's long-term crush. Rarity works as both a fashion designer and as a seamstress at her own shop in Ponyville, the Carousel Boutique. She has a white Persian cat named Opalescence. She represents the element of generosity.

characters.name: Twilight Sparkle
characters.description: Twilight Sparkle is the central main character of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is a female unicorn pony who transforms into an Alicorn and becomes a princess in Magical Mystery Cure. She is also the daughter of Twilight Velvet and Night Light, the younger sister of Shining Armor, sister-in-law to Princess Cadance, and paternal aunt to Flurry Heart.

characters.name: S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #1
characters.description: One of several Breezies featured in It Ain't Easy Being Breezies. Also appears in a flashback to It Ain't Easy Being Breezies in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, during Let the Rainbow Remind You in Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2, during The Magic of Friendship Grows in The Last Problem, on the season 4 poster, on Enterplay trading card series 3 card #E81, and on Enterplay collectible card game set Absolute Discord cards #138 R and #168 C. Shares its design with S04E16 Unnamed Breezie #13, Cloudia Breezie, Sunny Breezie, Lilac Breezie, Sea Breezie, Sunset Breezie, B3014 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #3, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #1, B3016 Unnamed Breezie #3, Unknown Breezie #1, and Unknown Breezie #2 and has a similar color scheme to "Doseydotes", Prim Posy, and "Cotton Top".

characters.name:
Friendship Flutter
B3014 Unnamed Breezie #1

Shares its design with Breezie Pinkie Pie, B3015 Unnamed Breezie #2, and B3016 Unnamed Breezie #2, and has a similar color scheme to Lemon Hearts. According to packaging description, Rarity "has a fashion show for her fairy friends."

According to flashback narration, Radiant Hope "made friends with shadows and pixies and things no one else could see."
